name: Guns of Icarus Alliance
description: Guns of Icarus Alliance is the ultimate player-vs-player, player-vs-environment, steampunk airship combat game, complete with an ongoing war between six elite factions vying for control of a world ravaged by machines. Up to 32 players can join a match for epic airship battles, with 4 players manning each ship. Or you can team up to take on a devastating AI that learns your habits. In this ever-changing universe, a teamâ€™s successes and failures constantly shape and reshape the world based on who dominates the battlefield. In the skies of Guns of Icarus, you and your crew triumph or perish, together.
